text:
Is it possible to make a nested dictionary a Tables source?
Specifically, I often have this kind of data structure:
```
Dict{Any,Dict{Any,Baz}} # pkey -> skey -> value
```
where
```
struct Baz
	id
	data::NamedTuple
end
```
Any thoughts appreciated. Thanks!
